mapper.select: SELECT qna.qna_no AS qnaNo, qna_title AS qnaTitle, qna_content AS qnaContent, qna_writer AS qnaWriter, qna_date AS qnaDate, qna_password AS qnaPassword, reply_no AS replyNo, reply_content AS replyContent, reply_date AS replyDate from qna LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM reply WHERE (reply.qna_no) IN (SELECT reply.qna_no FROM reply) GROUP BY reply.qna_no) AS r ON qna.qna_no = r.qna_no where qna.qna_no = #{qnaNo}

SELECT qna.qna_no AS qnaNo, qna_title AS qnaTitle, qna_content AS qnaContent, qna_writer AS qnaWriter, qna_date AS qnaDate, qna_password AS qnaPassword, reply_no AS replyNo, reply_content AS replyContent, reply_date AS replyDate FROM qna LEFT JOIN(SELECT * FROM reply WHERE (reply.qna_no) IN (SELECT reply.qna_no FROM reply) GROUP BY reply.qna_no) AS r ON qna.qna_no = r.qna_no order by qna.qna_no DESC LIMIT #{start},#{numPerPage}
mapper.update: update qna set qna_title = #{qnaTitle},qna_content=#{qnaContent},qna_writer=#{qnaWriter},qna_date=date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') where qna_no=#{qnaNo}
